name: slinkily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a sexually attractive way, or in a slow way that suggests sex: A slinkily dressed woman met us at the door and showed us the way. She reclined slinkily across the piano and lowered her voice to a whisper.
More examplesFewer examplesHer hair fell slinkily across my hand.He moved slinkily across the room.The choreographers directed their female dancers to move more slinkily than the men.He has a slinkily expressive way of singing the song.
